name: WordPress Spam Blocker | Stop Spam for Contact Form 7, WP Forms and Formidable Forms
author: Om Ak Solutions

sections.description:
WordPress SPAM Blocker, formerly Contact Form 7 Manual Spam Blocker, is an easy-to-use plugin to block all those spammers who manually fill out forms on your website.

BLOCK THEM AS YOU FIND THEM

It provides with an extra tab on each Contact Form 7 (CF7) edit screen where you can set block conditions for each input field in the form.

Spammer usually can be identified with the continuous, unwanted contact form submission on your website who include some sort of marketing text in their message, e-mail are usually from the same domain.

Each time you find a new spammer irritating you, just add another line in the block settings and show them a harsh spam message.

[Check out the Demo]

Features of the plugin:

  • Honeypot to Block Automatic SPAM
  • Block all CF7 Fields
  • Add upto 5 SPAM terms
  • Quick Links in Email
  • Change and Edit SPAM Message
  • Supports WpForms and Formidable Forms as well
    If you are irritated of all the SPAM that clusters your inbox then, this is the most suitable plugin for you.

Our Plugin blocks Every Term that is entered at the time of setup and the results are amazing as NO SPAM is Recieved after once setup.

What’s more?:
The premium version – Contact Form 7 Manual Spam Blocker has additional features:

  • Global Blocklist for Forms
  • Email Domain Blocklist
  • SPAM Block Counters
  • Honeypot Field Options
  • Easy Access in Admin Email
  • Advance Filtering Conditions

View on CodeCanyon

Honeypot Field for SPAM Bots
Although we have created a plugin which blocks Manual SPAM but we still remembered the Smart and Notorious SPAM Bots. Our Honeypot field blocks all the SPAM which these Bots are used to create.
To create a Honeypot Field:
* Go to the Form tab in CF7
* You will see a tag [cf7msb-honeypot]
* Click on the tag and the field will be added to the form
sections.installation:
The quickest method for installing the Contact Form 7 Manual Spam Blocker plugin is:

  1. Visit Plugins -> Add New in the WordPress dashboard
  2. Search for “Contact Form 7 Manual Spam Blocker”
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Finally click “Activate Plugin”

If you are tech savvy and prefer to do things manually then follow these instructions:

  1. Upload the cf7-manual-spam-blocker folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to WordPress Spam Blocker for setting up the plugin
sections.faq:
Which type of fields I can set SPAM blocking for?

We have allowed spam blocking on text, email, textarea, url and tel fields of Contact Form 7 (CF7). For the sake of ease few field types (select, checkbox, radio, captcha, number) are not enabled.

How to block big message in textarea input?

To block SPAMMING in textarea field you should choose blocking condition “Value Contains” and use a small and important phrase from the SPAM message you receive.

Does it also block bots?

Yes, by using Honeypot Field in the form you can block most of the automated spam.

How to use Honeypot Field?

To create a Honeypot Field:
* Go to the Form tab in CF7
* You will see a tag [cf7msb-honeypot]
* Click on the tag and the field will be added to the form

sections.reviews:
Complete disconnect between the description and what is there...

By DesktopMasters on January 11, 2020

I am giving this one star. But in all honestly I was never able to actually use the plugin. It says in the description that you can block up to 5 words.. But you are allowed to block ZERO words. There really is no way to demo the plugin before you buy it. But I thought, what the hell.. I will go see how much it cost.. So when I could not find a link to "Go Pro" in the settings I went to the description. There was a link to codecanyon.. But when you get there.. the page has been taken down. So as best I can guess the plugin has been abandoned

Free version has very limited functionality

By jortegac on April 3, 2019

The honeypot functionality didn't stop any spam for me. This plugin can only stop messages in which the spammer manually types something identical to what you specified as forbidden in the settings for each field of your form (which is of course very unprobable to happen). If you want to block messages containing keywords instead of whole phrases (what the developers call "advanced filtering"), you will have to go for the pro version.

A must have Spam blocker for Contact Form 7

By jindalravi2012 on March 20, 2019

I was receiving lots of spam mails on daily basis through CF7 form submission but recently i saw this plugin and amazed by its performance of blocking spam submissions. Use it to know more.

Thanks For Stopping Manual Spam

By Satinder Singh (satindersingh) on June 9, 2021

From last few days i was getting some manual spam emails by some spammers, but this plugin helped me stopping these by adding spam words list in contact form.
